reqs:
Non-Commerce students only. If you are unable to register in a section of this course and you have been admitted by your Faculty to the Minor in Commerce or another approved program in which this course is a requirement, you may submit a registration request using the form available on the Sauder website: https://mybcom.sauder.ubc.ca/courses-money-enrolment/courses-and-registration/registration-assistance .
Students not meeting any of the criteria within the restricted seats will only be able to register if there are general seats available.
NOTE: Course registration is administered by the Sauder Undergraduate Office and NOT the instructor (DO NOT CONTACT THE INSTRUCTOR).

description: An introductory examination of work organizations and the behaviour of individuals within them. Phenomena to be studied include organizational structure, environments, group processes, motivation and leadership (for non-Commerce students only).
